|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0013 |subvendor_id = 1186 |subdevice_id = 3a1b |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = RRK2004050123-1 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:15:E9,00:19:5B,00:1B:11,00:1C:F0

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/13/2004 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B000FJ6PT6 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "8WPCG06..3A1" is silkscreened to the board. "1WPCG07...A1" is printed on a label affixed to the device.
This device appears to use AR2414 [http://www.mythdora.com/?q=node/4028#comment-17633]
*A1 OUIs: 00:15:E9 *A2 OUIs: 00:19:5B, 00:1B:11, 00:1C:F0
